name: Yunus Emre Baytekin
label: Project/Program Manager, Scrum Master
summary:
Certified Project Manager, Scrum Master and Power BI Data Analyst with 18 years of experience in automotive OEM, Tier 1-2 manufacturing and software companies, with a background in Project Management Office (PMO), quality assurance and design verification. 
Proven ability to lead and deliver complex engineering R&D, new product launch and facility investment projects from initiation to closure phases

work_experience.summary: Led project management activities for multiple Battery Management System and algorithm / software development projects
highlights: Led up to 5 cross-functional domains/teams, scrum ceremonies (sprint planning, daily stand-ups etc.) to deliver projects on time and within budget (up to 1.6 M £), ensuring alignment with quality standards and stakeholder expectations

Managed internal & external stakeholders communication (customers, 6 suppliers from EU, US, China) and project deliverables using agile and waterfall methodologies, tracking resource allocation, mitigating risks
Prepared and compiled key project documents (budget estimates, project charter, deliverables, schedules, release notes) during RFQ - request for quotation -, and throughout project life cycle
Led MAN.3 (project management) & SUP.8 (configuration management) workstreams as per ASPICE

work_experience.summary: Led the Project Management Office and coordinated new product launch projects across multiple departments and teams
highlights: (Direct report to the General Manager) Developed and implemented project governance strategies and policies such as standardized project work packages (i.e tool validation workflow), dashboard improvements, enhancing the company-wide project management practices

Acted as project leader and single point of customer contact in new product launch projects for European OEMs/Tier-1’s by leading tool try out, run at rate scheduling, procurement planning, risk & issue management
Ensured adherence to Advanced Product Quality Planning (APQP) and Production Part Approval Process (PPAP)within the IATF 16949 framework for all new product launches
Provided coaching and guidance to the two project leaders reporting to him

work_experience.position: Chapter Lead, Product Development - Vehicle Evaluation and Verification,
work_experience.summary: Led a group of specialists from cross-functional disciplines in Heavy Commercial Vehicle business unit

work_experience.position: Supervisor, Product Development - Vehicle & Systems Testing
work_experience.summary: Planned and executed design verification and validation activities for new vehicle programs in Heavy Commercial Vehicle business unit

projects.title: Eatron Technologies

highlights: 12V Lithium Powernet LFP Battery Management System (Hardware + Software) : B-sample for European OEM
2nd phase of 12V BMS (platform) : Improvement and refinement of HW design + cost optimization
Design and HiL Validation of 48V Battery Management System : A-sample for European light mobility consortium
Software adaptation to Battery Energy Storage System : Feasibility investigation, optimization and integration of the State of Health feature of BMS software to the customer hardware
